title: Pop Star Studio
info: Website I made for a firend. Hosted on Heroku(until they shut down free hosting for Node.js ): ). You can become a member(create an account) or just listen to some music. Also there is a language selector. For now it is just an embeded YouTube 24/7 live stream, but later on there will be music of his own.

title: Login Form
info: Simple login form with hashed passwords and authentication token made using React for frontend and Node.js for backend. For database i used MongoDB. All errors handled appropriately.

title: 十面埋伏
info: Game made for DESKTOP(prefered resolution 1920x1080). Also you need a keyboard to be able to play.. I made this in collaboration with a friend who is currently in Sky-music studying to become a sound technician. He provides the sounds and i provide the code.

title: Battle Realms
info: Tribute page to one of my top two childhood video games.

title: NotTinder
info: Work still in progress.. In the end I am hoping to make a web app that is similar to Tinder, but it just isn't Tinder, more like Not Tinder. In this project I am also working with some of my friends who actually came up with the idea.
